description: This Dart source file defines the FilterPersistence class, which provides methods to save, load, and clear filter criteria using shared preferences storage. It is part of a preference management system in a frontend application.

classes.name: FilterPersistence
classes.description: A class providing static and instance methods to persist and retrieve filter criteria in local storage.

methods.name: saveCriteria
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the provided filter criteria as a JSON string in local shared preferences.

methods.name: loadCriteria
methods.description: Asynchronously loads filter criteria from local storage, returning null if not present or malformed.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Asynchronously clears the stored filter criteria from local storage.
